name: Combine.it
description:
This Game is made for the GMTK 2021 game jam. 

It is a casual, cute, 2d, single-player game. It was made with the help of Michael Silverman: check out the credits menu in game.  

What are your thoughts?  is it too hard, too easy, fun or challenging? Tell me what you think in the comments. If you have any improvement ideas or bugs please let me know.
